original_title: なんで私がこんな目に… 堀中未来
overview: Love, part-time job, university, and a busy but fulfilling future. I had so much fun texting and dating with my boyfriend Takumi in between seminars and part-time jobs. On the other hand, Kozue, Takumi's junior, stares at the two with hatred. She fell in love with Takumi, but Kozue, who learned of her future existence, posted on SNS with a fake future account in an attempt to break up the two. 'Whoever rapes me, please contact me'.
title: Why do I look like this ... Mirai Horinaka
